name: Demons
description:
Everyone has demons. 

But it is possible to overcome them.

Do not give in to the darkness.

Do not let your light fade.

Stick close to your light.

You will be okay.

Demons is a short top down shooter that is tailored by your choices. Credits
  • Liam McAlinden
  • Sebastian Scaini
  • DreLaurent
Soundtrack
